instructions: Go to the App Store and download a content-blocking app to your iPhone. The example here is Norton Ad Blocker, but all ad-blocking apps work similarly. See the list below for other suggested apps. Open the ad blocker app and follow any instructions to set it up. Every app is different, but each offers instructions for you to follow to turn on the ad-blocking abilities. On the iPhone home screen, tap Settings to open the Settings app. Tap Safari . Tap Content Blockers . Move the toggle switch next to the ad-blocker app you installed to On/green .
On the iPhone home screen, tap Settings . Tap Safari . Move the Block Pop-ups toggle switch to On/green. When the slider is to the right and is green, pop-up blocking is enabled.
